data.question: What is the chemical formula of H2PCNDI?
What method was used to measure the UV–vis–NIR spectra in the study?
What was the yield percentage of (Li+)2(PCNDI2−)•(H2O)0.25 when synthesized from LiOH and H2PCNDI?
How was the crystal structure of H2PCNDI and (1~5)•(H2O)n salts determined?
data.answer: Using a Rigaku RAPID-II diffractometer equipped with a rotating anode fitted with a multilayer confocal optic, using Cu-Kα radiation from a graphite monochromator.

data.question: What was the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level of H2PCNDI according to density functional theory (DFT) calculations?
What was the method used to evaluate the charge carrier mobility in the study?
What was the activation energy (Ea) for the dielectric relaxation I in dehydrated 4•(H2O)0?
What was the maximum ionic conductivity (σion) value observed for dehydrated 2•(H2O)0?
What was the trend observed in the φΣμ values in relation to the cation size in the study?
data.answer: The φΣμ values decreased in the order of Cs+ ≈ Rb+ ≈ K+ > Na+ > Li+.

data.question: How did the presence of water (H2O) affect the electron mobility in the thin films of the study?
data.answer: The electron mobility of the hydrated thin films was higher than that of the dehydrated films, indicating H2O-tolerant n-type semiconducting behavior.

data.question: Is the method used for measuring the UV–vis–NIR spectra capable of covering a wide range of wavelengths?
data.answer: Yes, the PerkinElmer Lambda 750 spectrophotometer used for measuring the UV–vis–NIR spectra is capable of covering a wide range of wavelengths from 200 to 3000 nm.

data.question: The yield percentage of (Li+)2(PCNDI2−)•(H2O)0.25 was higher than 50%.
data.answer: False, the yield percentage of (Li+)2(PCNDI2−)•(H2O)0.25 was 43%.

data.question: The crystal structure determination used X-ray diffraction with Cu-Kα radiation.
data.answer: True, the crystal structure determination used X-ray diffraction with Cu-Kα radiation.

data.question: The highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level of H2PCNDI was higher than -7 eV according to DFT calculations.
data.answer: False, the HOMO energy level of H2PCNDI was -7.3836 eV according to DFT calculations.

data.question: The Flash-photolysis time-resolved microwave conductivity (FP-TRMC) method was used to directly measure the photocarrier generation yield (φ) and the sum of photogenerated electron/hole mobilities (Σμ).
data.answer: True, the FP-TRMC method was used to directly measure the photocarrier generation yield (φ) and the sum of photogenerated electron/hole mobilities (Σμ).

data.question: The activation energy (Ea) for the dielectric relaxation I in dehydrated 4•(H2O)0 was less than 40 meV.
data.answer: False, the activation energy (Ea) for the dielectric relaxation I in dehydrated 4•(H2O)0 was 46.8 meV.

data.question: The maximum ionic conductivity (σion) value observed for dehydrated 2•(H2O)0 was less than 1.0 × 10−5 S cm−1.
data.answer: False, the maximum ionic conductivity (σion) value observed for dehydrated 2•(H2O)0 was 1.0 × 10−4 S cm−1.

data.question: The presence of water (H2O) decreased the electron mobility in the thin films of the study.
data.answer: False, the presence of water (H2O) increased the electron mobility in the thin films of the study.
